channel.title: Project Anfernio
channel.description:
Updates:
Started on Donator's tab. Made it check if you were donator or not. Displays correct interfaces. Used Moh's converted skill interface from Devo 2.6 because I CBA to do it myself. Credits to Moh. Added a "Porno Tab". Credits to Jayden for the idea. - 50%. Credits to me for creating. - 50%. Added Godsword stance. ~Tyvm Cocoa. :D Added XP Lock. ~Credits to Scu11 on R00n-Sarvar for the icon, I created my own version of the code. Made it check when to update Magic icons, so you don't have to log-out and in. Same with prayer. ~TYVM JAYDEN. Added a coal mining area which gives you 150 XP everytime you put a coal into the mine trucks. Requires 40 mining to enter. Added basic "Canoe Station" traveling. Haven't seen any other server have this, so why not? The canoes take to same places as RuneScape. Makes navigating a little easier, ey? Edited idle packet. Added account locking. Made my own return code! (:
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/ad156a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2egh0zn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2dtq9lc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2mozifo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2cx6xjq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2njddw5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2zinh93.png[/img] FTW FIRST INTERFACE ^^^^^ Added Porn Tab. [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/281yp3s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/deo6bq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/3easm.png[/img] Will update later.

item.title: Project Anfernio
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Deathspirit, post:15, topic:295406”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=390690.msg2915512#msg2915512 date=1250381667]

How can you be turned on while playing a server at the same time? It just doesn’t mix. The server looks alright, but the porn tab just doesn’t fit in at all. Plus, paying 10m for something like that would piss me off more than anything.

LOLOL.
See, even the stupidest of MoparScape come up with the bright ideas.

That’s nice but also the porn tab ruins your server, lmao like dude this is a private server people actualy play it but not to see porn…

O, y not?

Porn is a retarded addition.

If you’re going to do that, dont show the people her name, or they would just google it, and fap there…

Use a mysterious b**ch that noone knows the name of.
Something they wont be able to find on the internet

besides that…
looks alright so far

Ken I use your naem?

GL anyway.

ROFLCOPTERS
[/quote] Uhh cough cough kids actualy play private servers also lol girls also do xD[/quote]

I suggested him to make a gayporn interface too.

Read full topic
